product_name: Mountain House Beef Stroganoff with Noodles - 5 Servings
long_description: Instant, tender beef chunks with noodles and mushrooms in a rich sour-cream sauce. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided; let stand for a few minutes, and serve. Hearty dinner for camping or backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Instant, tender beef chunks with noodles and mushrooms in a rich sour-cream sauce.
